Classic Articles

01 Jan 2016

Prof. Jason Wright has a nice ADS library that includes many classic (and recent) SETI papers

Here are some “classic” articles on SETI.

This is not a complete or comprehensive list…

  • Searching for Interstellar Communications
  • Search for Artificial Stellar Sources of Infrared Radiation
  • Communications from Superior Galactic Communities
  • Search for Artificial Stellar Sources of Infrared Radiation
  • Interstellar and Interplanetary Communication by Optical Masers
  • Direct contact among galactic civilizations by relativistic interstellar spaceflight
  • Transmission of Information by Extraterrestrial Civilizations.
  • The Infrared Detectability of Dyson Civilizations
  • Interstellar Radio Communication and the Frequency Selection Problem
  • On the Detectivity of Advanced Galactic Civilizations
  • The Zoo Hypothesis
  • The Search for Signals from Extraterrestrial Civilizations
  • The search for extraterrestrial intelligence
  • Explanation for the Absence of Extraterrestrials on Earth
  • Project Ozma II - Astronomers renew the search for CETI signals from space
  • Broadcast strategies in the galaxy - A principal message source locale
  • Eavesdropping - The radio signature of the earth
  • Interstellar probes - A new approach to SETI
  • The Great Silence - the Controversy Concerning Extraterrestrial Intelligent Life
  • Scintillation-induced Intermittency in SETI
  • The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence (SETI) 2001
  • Project Ozma: The Birth of Observational SETI
